analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol:
	Contract BitindiaVestingContract has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol#327-328)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BitindiaVestingContract.claimAmount (/unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol#280-320) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol#318)

Reentrancy in BitindiaVestingContract.claimAmount (/unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol#280-320):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol#318)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalCommitted (/unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol#319-320)

Reentrancy in BitindiaVestingContract.initialize (/unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol#155-166):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(totalCommitted <= token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol#161-163)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- initialized (/unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol#164-165)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/28/0xee61d0f4d7da6953b4e3ca62cbe10c16045b6a67.sol#18-21): it allows old versions
